mapper.sql: BatchNo, SerialNo, SequenceNo, RetCode, Errmsg, StatusFlag, AppId, AppSerialNo, mediaID, SendId, RecvId, SubmitTime, FinishTime, content, Ack, Reply, doCount, msgType, subApp, ContentMode, cacheTime
